english.segment1: I wish that I was Floyd Cramer. I'd pound out a country song. A cowboy, his keyboard. A Country Western Star
english.segment2: That's not where I belong. No that's not where I belong. Just a sad, sad song. Would be so wrong
english.segment3: I think that singin' is great. The melody is in place. But I can't play guitar
english.segment4: Be a country star. Be a country star. I could never be a country star. And leave without a trace
english.segment5: You dreamed you met Merle Haggard. A country superstar. You shared the stage of Farm Aid. And dreamed of going far
english.segment6: Is that where you belong. Ask God where you belong. In the end will they say. "He just sang country songs?".
